mapper.insert: insert into LectureReport(LectureReport_no, Curriculum_no, Subject, Content, Instructor, ETC, Period, "Date") values (#{lectureReport_no}, #{curriculum_no}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{instructor}, #{eTC}, #{period}, #{date}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE Curriculum_no=#{curriculum_no}, Subject=#{subject}, Content=#{content}, Instructor=#{instructor}, ETC=#{eTC}, Period=#{period}, Date=#{date}
